name: Bloomberg
description: Bring the power of Bloomberg to any news story, anywhere.
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://www.wikidata.org https://en.wikipedia.org https://www.google-analytics.com 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 https://mobapi.bloomberg.com; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data: http://logo.clearbit.com/ https://www.bloomberg.com https://assets.bwbx.io https://commons.wikimedia.org; font-src https://assets.bwbx.io;
